summary: This module contains a comprehensive suite of unit tests that verify the functionality of pulse schedule objects in Qiskit. The tests cover schedule construction, instruction insertion, timing calculations, channel handling, delay processing, schedule replacement, equality checks, filtering capabilities, and utility functions for insertion index and overlap detection.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of Qiskit pulse scheduling features to ensure reliable quantum control program execution and maintain code quality through automated testing.
